title: Devils Backbone (New York)
text: Devils Backbone is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> located in the <a href="Catskill%20Mountains">Catskill Mountains</a> of <a href="New%20York%20%28state%29">New York</a> southeast of <a href="Delhi%20%28village%29%2C%20New%20York">Delhi</a>. <a href="Scotch%20Mountain">Scotch Mountain</a> is located northwest, and <a href="Fyffe%20Cobble">Fyffe Cobble</a> is located west-southwest of Devils Backbone.
